medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain and diarrhea with fever.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began on the morning of admission with epigastric pain, followed by one episode of non-bloody diarrhea. Pain initially subsided but returned more severely in the right lower quadrant, radiating to the back.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Kidney stones 20+ years ago, hypothyroidism, acid reflux, tonic eye on right. Past surgical history includes adenoids removal, tubal ligation, and cosmetic surgery on the right breast nipple.
medical_history.family_history: Brother and sister with lung cancer, sister with breast and cervical cancer.
